response.body:
{
    "id": 64311,
    "title": "Ping - Neo bank for remote workers ",
    "body": "### **Ping - A Neo Bank that allows remote workers to invoice their employers and receive payments in USD & crypto and convert to local currencies**\n\n![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=64311&key=user_uploads/1075999/126b0c53-296b-4241-b724-6eab26d59cf5)\n\n**The problem Ping solves**\n\nCurrently, global workers use a complicated mix of solutions to access their contractors' fees (usually involving 3 different platforms or more), all of these options are expensive and time-consuming and it is very hard for them to convert the funds to local currencies. \n\n\\\n**How does Ping solve this?**\n\nPing offers an **ALL-IN-ONE platform that generates invoices, receives USD payments, deposits, international transfers, local currencies and crypto/stablecoins** to handle global cross-border payments instantly, with low fees and a positive contractor-employer experience.\n\n\\\n**How you can help**\n\nTry it for yourself! \\\n\\- **If you are a contractor:** signup at [www.letsping.com](http://www.letsping.com)  create and send beautiful invoices to whomever you want to get paid from.\\\n\\- **If you are a company:** register at [www.letsping.com](http://www.letsping.com) to start paying your contractors and employees. As a company you can also receive payments even investment through direct wire transfer.\\\n\\\nStart using Ping! click [here](https://letsping.com/).\n\n**We’d love to hear from you!**\n\nEmail us at: [founders@holaping.com](mailto:founders@holaping.com) \n\nTwitter: <https://twitter.com/holapinglatam>\n\nInstagram: <https://www.instagram.com/pinglatam/>\\\n\\\nLet’s Ping together!",
    "tagline": "Meet Ping: The solution for paying and getting paid remotely",
    "created_at": "2022-07-04T18:30:20.948Z",
    "company": {
        "id": 27267,
        "name": "Ping",
